Hey everybody. Here are some programs I found useful when creating a DnD adventure or campaign. 

Included in this torrent:

City Generator

Experience Calculator

Name Generator

Encounter Level Generator

DM Secretary

NPC Creator

Dice Roller

Encounter Sheet

Reference Sheets


Have fun with them, and hopefully get a lot of use out of them too. 

"I&#039;m going to cast Magic Missile on the darkness!"

SEED! SEED! SEED!
